item.title: Python with Reticulate
item.description:
Let’s download some packages.

And calculate European call.

{python echo=TRUE} import math import numpy as np from timeit import default_timer as timer start = timer() S = 100 K = 105 T = 1 r = 0.05 sigma = 0.2 I = 100000 z = np.random.standard_normal(I) ST = S * np.exp((r-0.5*sigma**2)T + sigma math.sqrt(T)z) hT = np.maximum(ST - K, 0) C0 = math.exp(-rT)*np.mean(hT) print(‘Value of %5.3f.’ % C0) end = timer() print(‘Elapsed time in seconds %5.3f.’ % (end - start))

start = Sys.time()
S = 100
K = 105 
T = 1 
r = 0.05
sigma = 0.2
I = 100000
z = rnorm(I)
ST = S * exp((r-0.5*sigma**2)*T + sigma * sqrt(T)*z)
hT = pmax(ST - K, 0)
C0 = exp(-r*T)*mean(hT)
C0
## [1] 8.031604
end = Sys.time() - start
print(paste("Elapsed time in seconds:", end))
